snippet: State Department spokeswoman Marie Harf on Thursday called the step “precautionary” but declined to specify the threat or list which missions would be closed.
lead_paragraph: State Department spokeswoman Marie Harf on Thursday called the step “precautionary” but declined to specify the threat or list which missions would be closed.

headline.main: United States to Close Embassies Sunday Over Security Fears
headline.print_headline: US to close embassies Sunday over security fears: State Dept
